block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Signed INF Benji Gil and assigned him to Buffalo of the IL. DETROIT TIGERS--Recalled RHP Franklyn German and RHP Fernando Rodney from Toledo of the IL. Purchased the contract of RHP Brian Schmack from Erie of the Eastern League. Optioned C Matt Walbeck and LHP Eric Eckenstahler to Toledo. Released RHP Steve Sparks. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated INF Carlos Guillen from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned INF Chad Meyers to Tacoma of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled RHP Rosman Garcia from Oklahoma of the PCL. Optioned RHP Juan Dominguez to Oklahoma. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated RHP Pete Walker from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Dan Reichert to Syracuse of the IL.

National League ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Activated RHP Matt Morris from the 15-day disabled list. Designated RHP Esteban Yan for assignment. Placed RHP Jimmy Journell on the 15-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Jason Pearson to Memphis of the PCL. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS--Placed OF Barry Bonds on the bereavement list. Activated LHP Kirk Rueter from the 15-day disabled list.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Signed INF Benji Gil and assigned him to Buffalo of the IL. DETROIT TIGERS--Recalled RHP Franklyn German and RHP Fernando Rodney from Toledo of the IL. Purchased the contract of RHP Brian Schmack from Erie of the Eastern League. Optioned C Matt Walbeck and LHP Eric Eckenstahler to Toledo. Released RHP Steve Sparks. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated INF Carlos Guillen from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned INF Chad Meyers to Tacoma of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled RHP Rosman Garcia from Oklahoma of the PCL. Optioned RHP Juan Dominguez to Oklahoma. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated RHP Pete Walker from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Dan Reichert to Syracuse of the IL.

National League ST. LOUIS CARDINALS--Activated RHP Matt Morris from the 15-day disabled list. Designated RHP Esteban Yan for assignment. Placed RHP Jimmy Journell on the 15-day disabled list. Optioned LHP Jason Pearson to Memphis of the PCL. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS--Placed OF Barry Bonds on the bereavement list. Activated LHP Kirk Rueter from the 15-day disabled list.
Women's National Basketball Association INDIANA FEVER--Placed G Stephanie White on the injured list. Activated F Leigh Aziz from the injured list. LOS ANGELES SPARKS--Signed F Lynn Pride.

National Football League ATLANTA FALCONS--Placed CB Juran Bolden on the physically unable to perform reserve list. Waived T Ulish Booker, P John Huber, TE James Hugo, WR John Lewis, PK John Markham, T Michael Saffer, RB Fred Talley and DT Ryan Watson. CHICAGO BEARS--Waived FB Casey Urlacher, DB Eric Joyce, TE Mobolaji Afariogun, P Brooks Barnard, C Carson Dach, PK Pat Dunne, T Pete Lougheed, LB Jerry Schumacher, OL Jamil Soriano, T Tim Vincent, Placed TE John Davis on the physically-unable-to-perform list. DALLAS COWBOYS--Released QB Clint Stoerner, K Ola Kimrin, C Dustin Keith, WR Aaron Boone and DE Charles Alston. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Released T Mark Bristol, T Morgan Pears, G Dwayne Pierce, WR Jimmy Fryzel, TE Dejhown Mandley, DT Tavares Jurineack, LB Devin Lemons, CB Cedric Donaldson and CB Terrance Leftwich. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Released P Kyle Richardson, TE Brandon Davis and WR Carl Morris. Placed DE Jamaal Green and G Damian Lavergne on injured reserve. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Released RB Rashaan Salaam, CB Keith Heyward-Johnson, DE Dwight Johnson, OT Jason Jowers, WR Jermaine Lewis, WR Aaron Lockett, LB Darnell Robinson, and WR Justin Skaggs. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Released P Andy Groom, K Rob Bironas, LB Altroy Bodrick, CB Hirchel Bolden, TE-LS Jeff Grau, OT Mitch White and TE Daniel Wilcox.
FLORIDA--Suspended freshman LB Channing Crowder and freshman LB Taurean Charles for the Aug. 30 season opener against San Jose State.
